title: A support agent placed me on hold for 40 minutes. Who can I complain to?
content:
I have had two issues:

When I filled out a support request to have an agent call me, I eaited almost 2 hours. Then when I received the call the agent on the line immediately put me on hold for 40 minutes until I hung up.

I did a support chat after that and after an extreme wait the agent said they would not assist because I happened to establish the chat while logged into my account instead of my wife's, under whose name the phone was purchased. I said she was here and offered to log into the account but he said he would not and disconnected the chat.

How can I file an executive complaint about this service? Or is it better to go to the better business bureau?
